markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Spear Frog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=674)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The spear frog is named for its toxin, which is traditionally used to envenom thrown projectiles like spears and daggers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Spear Frog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=674)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +0

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 12

**Toxic Skin** Anytime a creature touches the spear frog or an adjacent creature Strikes the spear frog with a melee attack, that creature is exposed to spear frog venom.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing plus spear frog venom

**Spear Frog Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 15 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round)

**Sticky Feet**   Spear frogs are not flat-footed when [Balancing](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) on a narrow surface, and they gain a +4 bonus to Reflex saves to avoid falling.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-137" />
name: Spear Frog
